Articles.Content: I recently install Mechjeb 2... and it doesn't work right. I get the menu and all that, and autopilot engages. It won't corrective steer, use RCS, nothing. It does time warp to the orbit circularization point, then nothing. It literally launches up, then falls down, that's it.

I recently install Mechjeb 2... and it doesn't work right. I get the menu and all that, and autopilot engages. It won't corrective steer, use RCS, nothing. It does time warp to the orbit circularization point, then nothing. It literally launches up, then falls down, that's it.

Install the latest dev build.. I had the same problem.. here's the link http://jenkins.mumech.com/job/MechJeb2/

Edited November 14, 2015 by Talavar
